short_summary: Supply and delivery of one (1) industrial vertical band saw.
description: Department of National Defence (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake, 1 Air Maintenance Squadron (1 AMS) Machine Shop requires the supply and delivery of one (1) industrial vertical band saw for the purpose of fabricating aluminum, steel and wooden components that are necessary for our CF18 Maintenance.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Vertical Band Saw
### Request for Proposal: W0134-24R005

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, in collaboration with the Department of National Defence, is inviting proposals for the supply and delivery of one (1) industrial vertical band saw. The machine is required for the fabrication of aluminum, steel, and wooden components necessary for CF18 maintenance at the 4 Wing Cold Lake, 1 Air Maintenance Squadron (1 AMS) Machine Shop.

### Tender Details
* Tender Title: Vertical Band Saw
* Reference Number: WS4051453354-Doc4051515239
* Solicitation Number: WS4051453354
* Publication Date: August 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 5, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: August 29, 2023

### Procurement Category and Method
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Requirements
* The tender is for the supply and delivery of one (1) industrial vertical band saw.
* The machine must be suitable for fabricating aluminum, steel, and wooden components.
* The expected contract start date is November 10, 2023, and the expected contract end date is September 22, 2023.

### Selection Criteria
* The selection criterion is the Lowest Price.

### Trade Agreements
* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Jaspreet Grewal
* Contact Email: jaspreet.grewal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone (optional): (provided only if available)
* Contact Fax (optional): (provided only if available)

### Notice URL
* The notice URL is available at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17079407?extsite=MTcwNzk0MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Attachment
* No attachments are provided.
